claim: Remote Control Productions has provided the scores for Transformers.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Remote Control Productions has been responsible for the scores for a number of successful live-action films including the Pirates of the Caribbean movies , Iron Man , Gladiator , Mission : Impossible 2 , The Last Samurai , Transformers , Hancock , Kingdom of Heaven , The Da Vinci Code , Inception , Sherlock Holmes and its sequel , and The Dark Knight Trilogy , along with successful animated films such as the Shrek series , Kung Fu Panda , Madagascar , The Lion King , and more .

claim: Remote Control Productions has provided the scores for Transformers.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Glennie-Smith is a part of Hans Zimmer 's film score company Remote Control Productions , for which he has conducted the soundtracks such as The Simpsons Movie , Transformers : Revenge of the Fallen , X-Men : First Class and Pirates of the Caribbean : On Stranger Tides .
